post:
Starry Network Limited is a registered company in Hong Kong, providing virtual private servers in Hong Kong, South Korea, Japan, and USA. Today we bring a KVM offer in South Korea.

 * CPU: 1
 * RAM: 512MB
 * HDD: 20GB
 * Bandwidth: 400GB @ 100Mbps
 * IP: 1
 * Visualization: KVM
 * $7 /Month
 * Coupon: 7N7L8O1DLT

Order Now: https://my.starrydns.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=508&currency=2  
Other plans can be found at: https://www.starrydns.com/en/south-korea-vps  

Free RAM upgrade: Orders before May 1st will receive double RAM (1GB in total) for this plan.

Addons:

 * Additional IP: $3 / IP
 * Additional Traffic: $0.04 / GB

Datacenter: Seoul, South Korea - Korea Telecom  
Test IP: 210.92.18.1

Payment method: We currently accept Paypal only, and we will add other gateways in near future.


Refund policy: We offer 3-day money back guarantee, please refer to https://www.starrydns.com/en/refund-policy to read more.  
ToS and AUP can be found at https://www.starrydns.com/en/tos and https://www.starrydns.com/en/aup


Notes before order:

1. The server is physically located in South Korea, where comes with national firewall that may block some websites.
2. Manual review is required for orders by new customers, which can take up to 24 hours.

Thank you!
